com.dotmarketing.util.diff.tag

Class ArgumentComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.util.diff.tag.ArgumentComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAtomSplitter, org.eclipse.compare.rangedifferencer.IRangeComparator

    public class ArgumentComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAtomSplitter
    Takes a String and generates tokens/atoms that can be used by LCS. This comparator is used specifically for arguments inside HTML tags.
